com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal

Class CommonCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.CommonCapabilities

  • public class CommonCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A list of server capabilities relevant for BKCommonLib to know about. Storing them in booleans instead of evaluating frequently helps performance a bit.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean CHAT_TEXT_JSON_VER2
      Since Minecraft 1.9 some changes to the chat component JSON structure
      static boolean DATAWATCHER_OBJECTS
      Since Minecraft 1.9 int-based datawatcher keys were replaced with Datawatcher objects, significantly simplifying registering these systems.
      static boolean ENTITY_MOVE_VER2
      Since Minecraft 1.11.2 the Entity move function had some changes, introducing a "EnumMoveType" enumeration parameter to handle piston motion.
      static boolean ITEMSTACK_EMPTY_STATE
      Since Minecraft 1.11 ItemStacks could be 'empty' using the empty constant introduced in 1.8.8.
      static boolean KEYED_EFFECTS
      Since Minecraft 1.9, effect names changed from simple names to longer keys with namespace to improve mapping and sound system handling.
      static boolean MULTIPLE_PASSENGERS
      Since Minecraft 1.9 more than one passenger per vehicle are permitted
      static boolean PLAYER_OFF_HAND
      Since Minecraft 1.9.2 players can dual-wield, now introducing an off-hand
      static boolean REVISED_CHUNK_ENTITY_SLICE
      Since Minecraft 1.8.3 EntitySlice class layout was changed
      static boolean VEHICLES_COLLIDE_WITH_PASSENGERS
      Minecraft 1.8.8 and before there was a bug in the World Entity collision handler.
      static boolean WORLD_LIGHT_DARK_INVERTED
      Since Minecraft 1.11.2 the World Provider 'isDarkWorld' boolean property was inverted.

    • Field Detail

      • VEHICLES_COLLIDE_WITH_PASSENGERS

        public static final boolean VEHICLES_COLLIDE_WITH_PASSENGERS
        Minecraft 1.8.8 and before there was a bug in the World Entity collision handler. This caused passengers to collide with their vehicle at random. Fun times!

      • KEYED_EFFECTS

        public static final boolean KEYED_EFFECTS
        Since Minecraft 1.9, effect names changed from simple names to longer keys with namespace to improve mapping and sound system handling. As a result, random.fizz turned into block.fire.extinguish.

      • CHAT_TEXT_JSON_VER2

        public static final boolean CHAT_TEXT_JSON_VER2
        Since Minecraft 1.9 some changes to the chat component JSON structure

      • DATAWATCHER_OBJECTS

        public static final boolean DATAWATCHER_OBJECTS
        Since Minecraft 1.9 int-based datawatcher keys were replaced with Datawatcher objects, significantly simplifying registering these systems.

      • PLAYER_OFF_HAND

        public static final boolean PLAYER_OFF_HAND
        Since Minecraft 1.9.2 players can dual-wield, now introducing an off-hand

      • ENTITY_MOVE_VER2

        public static final boolean ENTITY_MOVE_VER2
        Since Minecraft 1.11.2 the Entity move function had some changes, introducing a "EnumMoveType" enumeration parameter to handle piston motion. This changed the function signature.

      • WORLD_LIGHT_DARK_INVERTED

        public static final boolean WORLD_LIGHT_DARK_INVERTED
        Since Minecraft 1.11.2 the World Provider 'isDarkWorld' boolean property was inverted.

      • ITEMSTACK_EMPTY_STATE

        public static final boolean ITEMSTACK_EMPTY_STATE
        Since Minecraft 1.11 ItemStacks could be 'empty' using the empty constant introduced in 1.8.8. The player inventory 'dirty' state uses this new empty state, among others.

      • MULTIPLE_PASSENGERS

        public static final boolean MULTIPLE_PASSENGERS
        Since Minecraft 1.9 more than one passenger per vehicle are permitted

      • REVISED_CHUNK_ENTITY_SLICE

        public static final boolean REVISED_CHUNK_ENTITY_SLICE
        Since Minecraft 1.8.3 EntitySlice class layout was changed

      • CommonCapabilities

        public CommonCapabilities()
